name: AVAudioSession.InterruptionOptions
desc: Constants that indicate the state of an audio session after an interruption.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var shouldResume: AVAudioSession.InterruptionOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates the interruption by another audio session has ended and the app can resume its audio session.
